snippet: In “Pity the Billionaire” Thomas Frank gives his take on how the right has turned the country’s economic woes to its benefit.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book Pity the Billionaire: The Hard Times Swindle and the Unlikely Comeback of the Right by Thomas Frank.
lead_paragraph: In “Pity the Billionaire” Thomas Frank gives his take on how the right has turned the country’s economic woes to its benefit.

headline.main: How Conservatives Spin the Nation’s Predicament
headline.print_headline: A Liberal Does His Spin On Conservatives’ Spin
